title: Benji
description: Benji was a very special dog. Everyone loved that bright-eyed, independent mutt. Every morning Benji raced through town, greeting his friends and chasing the Finster cat. His best friends off all were the Chapman children, 9 yr. old Paul, and 7 yr. old Cindy. And the best time of all was a breakfast of delicious scraps in the Chapman Kitchen.Then suddenly, thrilling things began to happen! Benji found a beautiful girlfriend. Sinister intruders broke into Benji's secret hideout. The Chapman children were in terrible danger. And the only one in the world who could save them was heroic Benji!
author: Allison  Thomas
